DataElement.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Nodal Assessment Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response to questions which are necessary to allow clinical study participation, as outlined in the protocol, that are related to the significance or extent of nodal disease.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Nodal Assessment Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._Of or pertaining to a node, any bulge or swelling of an anatomical structure or part._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A definite pathologic process with a characteristic set of signs and symptoms. It may affect the whole body or any of its parts, and its etiology, pathology, and prognosis may be known or unknown.

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredName: Nodal Assessment Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Of or pertaining to a node, any bulge or swelling of an anatomical structure or part.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: Of or pertaining to a node, any bulge or swelling of an anatomical structure or part.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Patient has nodal disease lim
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has nodal disease limited to micrometastases (pN1Mi, greater than 0.2 mm and less than or equal 2 mm) or isolated tumor cells (pN0i+ less than 0.2 mm).

ReferenceDocuments.name: ALT_1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has nodal disease limited to isolated tumour cells (pN0i+ less than 0.2 mm).

ReferenceDocuments.name: ALT_2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has disease limited to nodal micrometastases.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CCTG_01
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patients with unequivocal determination of nodal disease that, in the opinion of the investigator, would prohibit protocol therapy administration.

DataElement.administrativeNotes: 9/27/23 Added AQT and alt OID, CCTG per ticket request CADSR0002884 cjl.
